reviewText: I would recommend this dvd to anyone looking to find out the truth about 9/11.

Destined to become a 21st century global-history/non-fiction film classic, along with Loose Change 9/11: An American Coup, and Dr. Stephen Jones newest, highly informative (and, based on the scientific method- sorry, believers of the '19 Arab hijackers' official conspiracy theory...) DVD called 'Nanothermite', as well as 'Last Man Out', and many others.  We need a new, impartial, non-politicized and internationally-run (no not the UN) investigation into what really happened that day- and the clarity of mind (and the temporary shelving of volatile/nationalistic emotions) to fully examine and review ALL of the available forensic, eyewitness, and video evidence (as stated in comments and reviews elsewhere) before drawing hasty conclusions about 'who' and 'how' and 'for what motive' (as the '19 Arab hijackers conspiracy theory so conveniently accomplished...)  Thank you to those of you reading, who may still actually believe that the 9/11 Truth movement is a bunch of 'hooey'- please take some time to thoroughly examine all of the available evidence (mentioned in the above-listed films.)  And thank you to the filmmakers for spreading the news...  The Truth will OUT.

This is the film that makes it impossible to accept the "official" version of the "911" tragedy any longer.  It presents no new, startling evidence - no "smoking gun."  What it does, though, is to organize the wealth of available material in such a way as leave no room for doubt.  Front and center, for me anyway, has always been the Video supposedly showing Osama Bin Laden taking credit for the attacks - a Video that just magically turned up almost out of nowhere a couple months after the attacks.  This Video has always been suspect precisely because it surfaced just about the time people were beginning to doubt the "official" version.  The other telling piece of evidence is, ironically, something that has no direct bearing on the events of "911."  It's the man from the Underwriters' Laboratory.  I recall vividly how he was ridiculed as being merely an underwriter who, as such, could have no valid opinion to offer.  What I learned for the first time from this DVD is that he wasn't merely an underwriter who leaped headlong into the "911 truth movement."  In point of fact (which was never mentioned in any of the reports I heard) the agency investigating the collapse of the twin towers (NIST) specifically contracted with Underwriters' Laboratory to run a series of tests to show how the towers could have fallen from the plane crashes.  These tests did not show what the NIST expected, so they were watered down.  This man was one of the team leaders conducting the tests and all he did was go public with the actual test results - for which he was summarily fired and held up to public ridicule.  Add to this the air traffic controller and FBI agent's testimony, plus the gross inconsistencies of the actual events, and you have quite a full blown picture of something greatly at odds with the "official" version.  So the question really comes down to: who's telling the truth - the government or this group of Italian/French/German producers?  I would say, go with the one that hasn't lied to you.  And that only leaves one choice.

For anyone interested in hearing a 'non-American' perspective of the tragic events of 9/11, this DVD is perfect.  It is enlightening to learn that so many learned professionals world-wide agree that the 'Official' narrative of that fateful day is pure farce.  A must for anyone seeking answers and the truth.

This is the best documentary on 9/11.  Hands down!!  If you want to know what REALLY happened, then buy this.  The Global Elite have an agenda.  World domination. Bilderberg Group, New World Order and the Illuminati.  Familiarize yourself with these terms. 9/11 was a False Flag Attack.  Project Northwoods. Our United States government cannot be trusted.  Thugs-r-us is their credo. They are puppets for the Global Elite.  This film will fill in all the missing pieces and let you make up your own mind.  I am 99.11 percent sure that 9/11 was an inside job. When you view this movie I believe you too will agree!!

I consider this film to be the most professional documentary ever made about 9/11. It is very artistic, well directed, very good picture and demonstration "specially when it comes to the planes" which makes you feel good that talented artists started to pay attention to such horrific event. It interviews scientists, pilots, politicians plus a noble prize winner who plays a main character throughout the documentary. Worth the money!

An excellent, though not exhaustive, look at 9/11 and the huge holes in the current "theory" put forth by the 9/11 commission and the us gov't on what happened.  This is not conspiracy theory - it is a point by point look at the facts.

Got me really thinking? They got me to watching this video over and over. But I really believe they are right. Do not want to say to much about this video because i think it is worth buying. Good info

For those of us who have awakened to the truth, this documentary is a godsend. For years I have been looking for a good film on the subject I could share with people. One that was well researched, one that was full of credible witnesses, and one that adhered to the highest production values. Zero has met and exceeded all of those expectations.
The witnesses and people giving testimony in this video are all experts in their field. They range from pilots to military, from crash scene investigators to FAA, from intelligence to engineers, from police and fire to actual witnesses of the crime itself. You are even treated to the testimony of an ex employee of Underwriters Laboratory who was fired for speaking up on UL's attempt to re-create the collapse of the towers in a lab.
People who are looking for the TRUTH, this video is for you. If on the other hand, you "can't handle the truth" and believe denial is a river in Egypt, do not by this video, it is not for you.

"In the light of what we have seen and heard, it seems that the official version of 9/11 is not sufficient. We want the facts to be explained to us, and above all, we want them to be properly investigated. Basically, we want someone to finally tell us the truth",
so said
Dario Fo,
who is a Nobel Prize Winner.

ZERO: An Investigation into 9/11, has one central thesis - that the official version of events surrounding the attacks on 9/11 cannot be true. This feature documentary from Italian production company Telemaco explores the latest scientific evidence and reveals dramatic new witness testimony, which directly conflicts with the US Governments account.

Featuring presentations from intellectual heavy weights; Gore Vidal, and Nobel Prize winner Dario Fo, the film challenges assumptions surrounding the attacks. In the words of Italian daily newspaper Il Corriere de la Sera "What results is a sequence of contradictions, gaps and omissions of stunning gravity".

The importance of this film can not be overstated, if its thesis is correct, the justification for declaring the war on terror is built on a series of outrageous lies.

The offical website has more information on this excellent movie [...]
If one doesn't think something is "fishy" about that whole 911 debacle after watching this documentary, then all hope is lost!

Excellent film.  Contrary to what the sole negative reviewer states, this film focuses solely on truth - specifically on the most significant and damning of the myriad holes in the official government story of what happened. Holes that prove - yes prove - that virtually all of the major elements of this fairy tale are lies.  Put it all together and its hard not to wonder if our nation's unwillingness to confront this issue--and the true perpetrators--means we are destined for another 9/11.

Wake up people.  Start with this film, and then dig deeper if you have the constitution to face the real enemy.

I love these movies that use the word 'truth' like some sort of commodity. Yes thats right folks your government won't give you truth but we'll sell it to you for the price of a dvd!!

The production is top notch. Jones is feverish and excited like some rock n roll monster guru. The information captures you, draws you in, makes you wriggle, squirm and by the end of the film you feel part of a team of elite and enlightened truth seekers. Yeah down with Bush, yargghh! Get out the speaker and start shouting at the Bilderbergers. The problem is I can't help but imagine what an even better documentary this would have been had they actually stuck to presenting facts instead of distorting facts. These conspiracy theorists can't budge from their stories angles though because that's how they make their money! So sorry you won't get the truth. What you will get is a cleverly put together fictional dvd that is fun and entertaining. It will give you lots of motives and lots of coincidence but not much in the way of hard scientific data.

Enjoy but keep an open mind ya?

EVERY AMERICAN should view this DVD.  9/11 WAS an inside job, and people AROUND the world are watching us wondering "Why can't these Americans figure this out?

The Government Shill (1 star), you can tell that by the review that tells no factual information as to WHY he does not agree with the DVD.  Look at all the 5 star ratings and GO by THAT!

The concluding sentence of this video, spoken on screen by the grieving father of one of the victims, should stick with the viewer forever: "The people should be ashamed of themselves for not seeking the truth." Not only do these Italian producers assemble a great deal of evidence that utterly destroys the official 9-11 conspiracy theory, but they present it in a very effective, heart-rending fashion. However, they have fallen short in one very important way. Though it is beyond their capacity to solve the crime completely and to identify precisely the actual perpetrators, they strongly suggest that it was the work of the CIA, the highest levels of the Bush administration, and certain elements of the U.S. military. They give not the slightest hint that Israel and its Mossad could have been involved. To give Israel its free ride they have ignored, among other things, the Mossad agents working for the Urban Moving Systems front company who were arrested after they were seen filming the burning towers and seeming to celebrate the event, and the advance warning that two employees of the Israeli-owned Odigo instant messaging service received. They also fail to explore the very important role of the mainstream media in the ongoing cover-up. These are important omissions that, unfortunately, call into question the genuineness of these film makers. Inside Job: Unmasking the 9/11 Conspiracies Towers of Deception: The Media Cover-up of 9/11
this is a very goood investigation of the actual facts on the twin towers, building number 7,the pentagon,NORAD, ...and what really transpired on 9/11.

Drop-dead excellent. Does not advance any theories whatsoever. Presents and discusses evidence. Interviews professionals, military experts, and eye-witnesses to discuss the official explanation. An extraordinarily thoughtful DVD.

The first 30 minutes of this production are proof the American people have been lied to, from the mouths of witnesses inside towers, who made it from floors above strike, through, and to floors below which were seen to be completely normal-lights, computers working, no fires to be witnessed.  Then there's building 7-which nothing hit, yet fell 7 hours later....

My husband is big into 9/11 conspiracy theories and conspiracy theories in general and has watched a number of documentaries on netflix, youtube, dvd, etc.  This is one of the best in presentation, engagement, and providing information that will make even the non-skeptic go, 'well huh?' Is everything presented accurate? Obviously there will be vastly differing opinions on that, as is the nature of conspiracy theories vs. 'published' truth.

The problem with 9/11 isn't the results but who was paid the most and (Larry Silverstein) the phony business developer received the largest payout in history at the expense of over 2,500 citizens.  Always follow the money trail and stop looking for a theory, money talks, and there are professional mercenaries and demolition engineers that will do anything for a large payout, don't ever trust an individual who perpetrates insurance fraud.
The Pentagon aspects that the video covers is outdated, and as a result, will cast doubt on the entire subject matter undeservingly.

This movie created a lot of excitement in the 9/11 truth community when it came out four years ago. I only got around to it recently. It has some good information, but it has a lot of errors and very dubious stuff too. The researchers were all Italians, and perhaps they had some language challenges in evaluating the quality of their information.

The video raises a lot of questions well worthy of further investigation, but viewers should check the facts, be skeptical, and do their own homework.

I am so impressed with how well this documentary was made.  Rather than making outrageous claims without substantiating them the producers of this documentary are on a mission to break down every major inconsistency that the "official" story of what happened on that horrible day claims.  I advise all members of the human race to give 2 hours of your life to at least here what this amazing group of scientists, professors, eye-witnesses, independent investigators, politicians and victim's family members have to say.

What did happen to WTC 7?

You must watch this and decide for yourself if the professional analysis of what actually happened makes sense to you.
I found the Pentagon being hit by a plane and everything in that plane had "vanished" as well as a plane getting inside the building when the hole was too small for it to enter ...enlightening

I also found that with the United States claiming to be the most powerful military nation in the "world" that it was interesting that our Jets did not scramble and take out the Commercial Airliners especially when the Commercial planes came within 3 miles of the Pentagon.

I immediately thought, "If Russia or Germany or any country had come within 3 miles or even 30 miles of the Pentagon bet they would have scrambled!  But like our President (at the time) said, "Who would have thought planes would run into buildings?"

Good content.  I purchased this since not available as a rental that I could find
and glad I purchased my own copy.
Very well done. I have several videos on this topic and I would rate this one of the better ones.
